function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global spread of COVID-19","Impact":"High death toll and widespread fear and anxiety","Mitigation":"Implementing strict public health measures, vaccination campaigns, and travel restrictions","Technologies":"AI for predictive modeling, computer vision for diagnosis, and knowledge graph for information organization","People":"General population, frontline health care workers","Owner":"Government, international health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of clear understanding of COVID-19 knowledge","Impact":"Misinformation and confusion among the public","Mitigation":"Promoting trustworthy sources of information, providing clear and accurate guidelines, and debunking myths and false information","Technologies":"AI for natural language processing, knowledge graphs for information organization","People":"General population, healthcare workers, policymakers","Owner":"Media organizations, health organizations, government"},{"Description":"Impact on frontline health care workers","Impact":"Increased workload, higher risk of infection, and mental health challenges","Mitigation":"Providing adequate protective equipment, mental health support, and implementing safe work practices","Technologies":"AI for predictive modeling, knowledge graphs for information organization","People":"Frontline health care workers, healthcare organizations","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government"}]}
